Saturday, 12. November 2022

Digital Scotland

Social Tech: Harnessing Technology to Drive Social Transformation

Our Social Tech Digital Nation project seeks to identify, and action, the transformational role technology can play in bettering society, tackling deep issues such as poverty and homelessness. The post Social Tech: Harnessing Technology to Drive Social Transformation appeared first on digitalscot.net.

Our Social Tech Digital Nation project seeks to identify, and action, the transformational role technology can play in bettering society, tackling deep issues such as poverty and homelessness.

‚ÄòSocial Tech‚Äô refers to Social Technology, the category of technology that seeks to identify and apply how it can enable social transformation.

Social Business

First we can consider the broader context of how business in general is taking on an increasingly social role, aka ‚ÄòSocial Business‚Äô.

‚ÄòSocial Business‚Äô is an evolution that disregards the rule that businesses only make money, and only charities do social good. They define ways of making money that improve the society‚Äôs they exist within, as a better commercial strategy too.

it is driven by entrepreneurs who are Motivated By Impact. and includes best practices such as ‚ÄòSocial Impact Investing‚Äò, where we broaden this ideal to society as a whole, that we will all be better off when we‚Äôre all better off, the rising tide.

As legendary management guru Michael Porter explains in this Harvard Business Review article Social Businesses are commercial organizations that synchronize social good and their own profit making.

This may seem obvious but evidence abounds of the cliche that for some to profit others must lose out and suffer. Michael prescribes a new methodology, Shared Value, for how this strategy can be understood and implemented, highlighting:

Companies must take the lead in bringing businesses and society back together.

Scottish Social Tech Pioneers

To encourage growth of the trend in Scotland we‚Äôll be showcasing entrepreneurs leading this field, such as Gavin Neate and his venture WelcoMe.

Gavin is pioneering #Tech4Good, an entrepreneurial solution for ensuring businesses are suitably cognizant of the needs of disabled and visually impaired visitors to their stores, hotels and airports, and also for governments to ensure all their facilities are equally welcoming.

The post Social Tech: Harnessing Technology to Drive Social Transformation appeared first on digitalscot.net.

08:50 • 8 hours ago

bitnation

Binance Labs Includes 12 Projects In Incubation Program

Binance Labs, the capital arm and accelerator of the world‚Äôs biggest crypto exchange, Binance, has introduced 12 projects for season 5 of its accelerator program, which kicked off on Nov. 7. This announcement comes at the time when the crypto market is experiencing a strong downward pressure and many of the crypto firms have collapsed [‚Ä¶]
Binance Labs Incubator Program‚Äôs 5th season includes Bracket Protocol, DappOS, HANA, Kryptoskatt, Mind Network, Notebook Labs, Ontropy, PIP, Sandbags Protocol, The Harvest. The exchange will offer an 8-week curriculum tailored to founder needs and enhanced with exclusive ecosystem resources like investment-focused demo day, face-to-face sessions with market leaders and more. Furthermore, in-person sessions for startups will be held at the Paris business incubator Station F from Nov. 7 to 20.

Binance Labs, the capital arm and accelerator of the world‚Äôs biggest crypto exchange, Binance, has introduced 12 projects for season 5 of its accelerator program, which kicked off on Nov. 7. This announcement comes at the time when the crypto market is experiencing a strong downward pressure and many of the crypto firms have collapsed or filed for bankruptcy.

As per the official announcement from the Binance blog, the Incubation Program ‚Äúoffers a 8-week curriculum tailored to founder needs and enhanced with exclusive ecosystem resources, including but not limited to fireside chats with market leaders and an investment-focused demo day.‚Äù This will help crypto-focused firms in increasing their reach and gaining more users in a short period of time.

‚ÄúBinance Labs has always been actively looking for scalable and downturn-resilient projects that we believe are crucial to the growth of the Web3 industry. Our incubation program aims to empower early-stage Web3 founders and help them reach their full potential, regardless of market conditions,‚Äù Yi He, Co-Founder of Binance and Head of the venture arm of the exchange, said.

The 8-week of incubation period will include the following for the 12 blockchain projects:

courses on Web3 chats with market leaders and incubator alumni 1-on-1 mentoring sessions with industry experts industry-wide demo day with investors post-incubation support

The 12 blockchain projects included in the Binance Labs Incubator Program are Bracket Protocol, DappOS, HANA, Kryptoskatt, Mind Network, Notebook Labs, Ontropy, PIP, Sandbags Protocol, The Harvest, all of which are in the growing phase and will receive guidance from the exchange and the developers and founders of other firms that have been a part of the incubation program in the past.

It is also crucial to note that the venture arm of the exchange will be hosting in-person sessions for startups at the Paris business incubator Station F from Nov. 7 to 20. Station F is one of the places where tech startups from all over the world gather to discuss and brainstorm along with showcasing their talent. Thus, Binance Labs will give the 12 crypto firms the chance to meet and explore with members of Web3 space and well as people from other industries.

It was also revealed in the announcement that through Binance‚Äôs two-week stint at Station F, ‚Äúthere will be offline mentoring sessions for industry experts and incubation projects to get into deep discussions face-to-face.‚Äù

Friday, 11. November 2022

bitnation

Sam Bankman-Fried‚Äôs Net worth Plunges to Zero

Sam Bankman-Fried not only watched his crypto exchange, FTX, decline in days but also suffered one of the biggest wealth losses in history. SBF appears to have lost most of his wealth days after being one of the richest men in the world. According to Bloomberg, the 30-year-old had a net worth of $16 billion, [‚Ä¶]
Sam Bankman-Fried has lost his wealth, which was once valued at $16 billion. SBF was recently revealed to have played a huge part in the US elections, funding candidates he admired. FTX‚Äôs decline is expected to trigger a chain reaction of other collapses.

Sam Bankman-Fried not only watched his crypto exchange, FTX, decline in days but also suffered one of the biggest wealth losses in history. SBF appears to have lost most of his wealth days after being one of the richest men in the world.

According to Bloomberg, the 30-year-old had a net worth of $16 billion, which is now worth nothing following FTX‚Äôs decline. Bankman-Fried rose to become one of the most prominent members of the crypto community and had a portfolio of businesses that included FTX and Alameda Research. SBF also had stakes in a couple of crypto companies, including Robinhood.

Both FTX and Alameda are bankrupt. Their different assets have been seized, and authorities have withdrawn their operating permits. FTX filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy on November 11, and Bankman-Fried announced his resignation. The last few days‚Äô events have cast a shadow of doubt over FTX and the broader crypto community.

According to Bloomberg, Alameda has lost all of its value. FTX International suffered a similar fate. SBF owned a 70% ownership in FTX US. However, the company is now only worth $1. Despite initial claims that FTX US was unaffected, the platform is shutting down and has asked customers to close any open positions.

Authorities in the Bahamas, where FTX.com is headquartered, and SBF resides, froze the company‚Äôs assets.
SBF also held a 7.6% stake in Robinhood (HOOD), which was valued at $589 million. However, according to Reuters, this stake was used as security for loans made through Alameda Research. Bloomberg calculates that SBF is left with nothing after watching his world crumble.

FTX suffered a liquidity crisis of about $8 billion due to recent events. The platform has been on a quest for a savior, but such prayers have remained unanswered. Binance was first announced as a potential buyer before pulling out of the deal a few hours later.

 A group of investors, led by Justin Sun and OKX, has been discussed as a possible solution to save the platform. However, there have not been any confirmed claims of a deal being closed.

20:13 • 20 hours ago

FTX Files for Chapter 11 Bankruptcy

The FTX drama has taken a new twist as the exchange‚Äôs CEO, Sam Bankman-Fried, announced that he had filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy in the District of Delaware. This news comes a few days after a proposed takeover plan with Binance failed to go through. In a statement shared on Twitter, Bankman-Fried also announced that [‚Ä¶]
FTX filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy, joining the likes of Voyager as notable failures. Sam Bankman-Fried has also resigned as CEO but will stay on to help the new team. Legislators have called for tougher sanctions against cryptocurrency firms after it has become common for projects to fail, wiping out users‚Äô funds.

The FTX drama has taken a new twist as the exchange‚Äôs CEO, Sam Bankman-Fried, announced that he had filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy in the District of Delaware. This news comes a few days after a proposed takeover plan with Binance failed to go through.

In a statement shared on Twitter, Bankman-Fried also announced that he will be stepping down from his role as CEO and will be replaced by John J. Ray III. However, the statement noted that SBF would stay on to aid a smooth transition.

A total of 130 additional connected companies are involved in the proceedings, including FTX.us, the corporation‚Äôs U.S. subsidiary, and Alameda Research, Bankman-Fried‚Äôs cryptocurrency trading company. FTX lists more than 100,000 creditors and assets between $10 billion and $50 billion. It also listed liabilities between $10 billion and $50 billion. Bankman-Fried also stated that he intends to name Stephen Neal as the company‚Äôs new chairman of the board.

The new FTX chief, Ray, said the chapter 11 filing offered immediate relief and was ‚Äúappropriate to provide the FTX Group the opportunity to assess its situation and develop a process to maximize recoveries for stakeholders.‚Äù

Ray said in his statement,

The FTX Group has valuable assets that can only be effectively administered in an organized, joint process. I want to ensure every employee, customer, creditor, contract party, stockholder, investor, governmental authority and other stakeholder that we are going to conduct this effort with diligence, thoroughness and transparency.

Press Release pic.twitter.com/rgxq3QSBqm

‚Äî FTX (@FTX_Official) November 11, 2022

Ray called for stakeholders to understand that things have moved quickly and that the new team has only recently begun working on the case. Crypto users have found it shocking that FTX, with a valuation of around $32 billion, declined to file for bankruptcy. According to reports, FTX Australia Pty Ltd., FTX Express Pay Ltd., LedgerX LLC, and FTX Digital Markets Ltd. are not included in the Chapter 11 proceedings.

The demise of a significant cryptocurrency trading platform like FTX is the most recent bankruptcy filing in 2022, following that of Voyager Digital and Celsius. Lawmakers worldwide have proposed tougher regulations for crypto businesses in response to the issue involving FTX and others.

Meanwhile, Bankman-Fried has remained active on social media, taking responsibility for the sad turn of events. Reemphasizing his previous apology, the crypto developer wrote,

I‚Äôm really sorry, again, that we ended up here. Hopefully things can find a way to recover. Hopefully this can bring some amount of transparency, trust, and governance to them. Ultimately hopefully it can be better for customers.

SBF said he will be working to provide ‚Äúclarity‚Äù on user recovery as soon as possible, adding, ‚ÄúThis doesn‚Äôt necessarily have to mean the end for the companies or their ability to provide value and funds to their customers chiefly.‚Äù

5) I'm piecing together all of the details, but I was shocked to see things unravel the way they did earlier this week.

I will, soon, write up a more complete post on the play by play, but I want to make sure that I get it right when I do.

‚Äî SBF (@SBF_FTX) November 11, 2022

EdgeSecure

Edge‚Äôs Principal Virtual Chief Information Security Officer to Share Journey to Leadership at Regional Women‚Äôs Educational Leadership Forum

The post Edge‚Äôs Principal Virtual Chief Information Security Officer to Share Journey to Leadership at Regional Women‚Äôs Educational Leadership Forum appeared first on NJEdge Inc.

NEWARK, NJ, November 11, 2022 ‚Äì Dr. Dawn Dunkerley, Edge‚Äôs Principal Virtual Chief Information Security Officer (vCISO), will share her journey to leadership at the New Jersey Association of School Administrators (NJASA) December 2, 2022 Regional Women‚Äôs Educational Leadership Forum and Breakfast to be held at Kean University.

As a highly certified cyber professional, proficient and experienced in cyber intelligence, cyber threat analysis and dissemination, incident handling, forensics, CSF transition and implementation, risk assessment, and penetration testing, Dr. Dunkerley will share highlights of her impressive career roadmap from senior subject matter expert supporting the United States Army, to Cybersecurity Lecturer at Clemson University, to her current role at Edge.

With extensive training and education in network security planning and procedure integration, risk assessment and management, incident investigation and forensic analysis, ethical hacking/penetration testing, malware, current legal issues within cyber, vulnerability mitigation, perimeter and internal protections, attendees won‚Äôt want to miss Dr. Dunkerley‚Äôs journey to leadership.

For more information about the NJASA event, visit https://portal.njasa.net/NJASA/Events/Event_Display.aspx?EventKey=WBKF120222.

To explore the Cybersecurity services offered by Edge, visit https://njedge.net/solutions-overview/cybersecurity/

15:11 • a day ago

Business Leader: Post-pandemic security: 79% IT decision-makers want company password manager implemented

According to the Bitwarden survey, roughly half of respondents deploy or have plans to deploy password-less technology. Of that percentage, 66% have one-to-two user groups or multiple teams using password-less [‚Ä¶] The post Business Leader: <strong>Post-pandemic security: 79% IT decision-makers want company password manager implemented</strong> appeared first on FIDO Alliance.

According to the Bitwarden survey, roughly half of respondents deploy or have plans to deploy password-less technology. Of that percentage, 66% have one-to-two user groups or multiple teams using password-less technology, and 13% have deployed to their entire organisation. Of those that have made the switch, 51% are or would consider implementing ‚Äòsomething you are‚Äô password-less authentication. Half (47%) say they are very familiar with the FIDO2 password-less authentication standard and consider it important to their company‚Äôs password-less experience.

The post Business Leader: <strong>Post-pandemic security: 79% IT decision-makers want company password manager implemented</strong> appeared first on FIDO Alliance.

15:09 • a day ago

eSSIF-Lab

Have a chat with David Chadwick ‚òïÔ∏è CEO at Verifiable Credentials Ltd (VCL)

Finding a way to easily implement verifiable credentials? üßê

Verifiable Credentials Ltd has 20 years of university research experience that users the most standards conformant, easiest to implement, fully secure, and privacy-protecting verifiable credentials eco-system from a co-author of the W3C Recommendation.

We have had the pleasure to interview David Chadwick, CEO at Verifiable Credentials and renowned expert on SSI, which will explain to you the beginning of this idea and which are their goals in the future.

1. Introduce yourself and your company, and what services or products you offer.

Verifiable Credentials Ltd (VCL) was a spin out company from the University of Kent, led by David Chadwick, Professor of Information Systems Security. The objective of VCL was to commercialise Professor Chadwick‚Äôs 20+ years of research into identity management that started with X.500/X.509 in the 1990s, and culminated in a proof of concept Verifiable Credentials prototype at about the same time that the W3C Verifiable Credentials Data Model Recommendation was first published. VCL applied to the first business-oriented eSSIF-lab call in order to build a user friendly controlled natural language (CNL) GUI for creating the policies that verifiers will need to specify for requesting verifiable credentials from users 1. The GUI allows users to specify their policies in either conjunctive normal form or disjunctive normal form, in the controlled natural language of their choice. English, German, French and Portuguese variants were produced during the eSSIF project. The CNL is then translated into VCL‚Äôs JSON-based policy language 2 and stored in an open-source Policy Server, allowing many different wallets and verifiers to share the same policy.

2. What have you achieved with your idea thanks to eSSIF_Lab project?

One of the unexpected outcomes of participating in eSSIF-lab, was that VCL was introduced to the TRAIN project being run by Fraunhofer. TRAIN allows verifiable credential ecosystems to provide scalable trust in issuers. This functionality was already in Professor Chadwick‚Äôs roadmap for VCL, so it was opportune to work with Fraunhofer and to integrate TRAIN into VCL‚Äôs prototype.

Shortly after the eSSIF project was completed in 2021, Crossword Cybersecurity PLC (CCP), a UK SME listed on the London AIM stock market, acquired VCL, in order to strengthen VCL‚Äôs development and marketing teams. CCP now licenses the Identiproof product, which is a fully standard conformant implementation of the W3C VC Data Model.

Identiproof comprises a VC issuer, a wallet for both Android and iOS, and a VC Verifier, along with background services such as a policy server and audit server. CCP is currently leading the NGI Atlantic project ‚ÄúNext Generation SSI Standards‚Äù which is implementing the OpenID for Verifiable Credentials (OID4VCs) protocol suite. Partners in this project are Spruce Inc from the USA and Fraunhofer from Germany. Interworking tests between Spruce‚Äôs (or CCP‚Äôs) wallet and CCP‚Äôs (or Spruce‚Äôs) issuer and verifier are currently taking place, Under this project TRAIN has been extended by Fraunhofer to support scalable trust in both verifiers and wallet software providers, as well as in issuers. A protocol enhancement to OIDC4VCs has been specified in order for TRAIN to be tested between the USA and Europe.

3. What are your goals for the middle/long-time future?

CCPs short to medium-term goals are to fully integrate the OIDC4VCs protocol suite and enhanced TRAIN infrastructure into Identiproof, and to add a web-based wallet to Identiproof to complement its existing iOS and Android offerings. Since the education market is one of CCP‚Äôs identified markets for verifiable credentials, CCP‚Äôs short-term goal is to successfully participate in the JFF Plugfests in order to show that Identiproof is a standards conformant product that can interwork with a whole range of different verifiable credential products from different providers across the globe.

4. Any piece of advice for those who are looking for public funding?

CCP‚Äôs advice to others who are looking for public funding is to keep one step ahead of the crowd in your R&D work, so that when calls for proposals are issued you already have a very good idea and well worked-out plan of what you want to develop. Ideally, you may already have a proof of concept in your lab.

The post Have a chat with David Chadwick ‚òïÔ∏è CEO at Verifiable Credentials Ltd (VCL) first appeared on eSSIF-Lab.

09:18 • a day ago

LionsGate Digital

Fireblocks Launches Digital Asset Payments Engine with FIS Joining as New Network Member

New end-to-end solution has settled $1B in transactions to date with Checkout.com and will enable a global digital asset economy for merchants, entrepreneurs and creators. Fireblocks (www.fireblocks.com), an easy-to-use platform to create innovative products on the blockchain and manage day-to-day crypto operations, announced today the public launch of its Payments Engine,

New end-to-end solution has settled $1B in transactions to date with Checkout.com and will enable a global digital asset economy for merchants, entrepreneurs and creators.

Fireblocks (www.fireblocks.com), an easy-to-use platform to create innovative products on the blockchain and manage day-to-day crypto operations, announced today the public launch of its Payments Engine, a new suite of tools that will enable payment service providers (PSPs) with the ability to provide a blockchain agnostic, end-to-end solution for merchants, entrepreneurs and creators to accept, manage and settle digital asset payment transactions across any geography. 

Early pilot partner Checkout.com, who was instrumental in supporting the development of the Payments Engine, has facilitated more than $1 billion in digital asset merchant settlements through their solution this year. Today, Fireblocks welcomes FIS, the largest merchant acquirer in the world, into its network of partners using the Payments Engine. FIS and its Worldpay solutions already provide card-to-crypto processing services for 4 of the top 5 cryptocurrency exchanges and was the first global merchant acquirer to offer USDC settlements. Together, the payment services providers collectively serve over a million merchants around the world. 

‚ÄúIn the last several years, critical work has been done in the space to address pieces of the payments system,‚Äù said Michael Shaulov, CEO of Fireblocks. ‚ÄúFrom stablecoin settlement to cross-border payments to payouts for creators, we believe that the payments system must be addressed holistically, especially as we see digital assets continue to proliferate into mainstream technologies and the global economy. We have seen a tremendous amount of momentum from some of the biggest names in categories such as creator economies, streaming applications, and ride-sharing apps, who are actively thinking about more efficient ways to remit payments to marketplace participants.‚Äù

Following the acquisition of First Digital, which brought specialized digital asset payments capabilities to the Fireblocks‚Äô platform, the newly launched Payments Engine provides a turnkey solution for businesses that want to integrate digital asset operations into existing or new products. Utilizing Fireblocks‚Äô Payments Engine, PSPs will have a secure platform to deploy new digital asset payment rails, expanding their capabilities to accept, collect, payout, process and settle transactions using digital assets. 

‚ÄúThe widespread use of stablecoins have made digital asset-based payments use cases very compelling for payments companies,‚Äù said Fireblocks Vice President and Head of Payments, Ran Goldi. ‚ÄúFireblocks‚Äô new Payments Engine will allow PSPs to offer and interact with a new breed of payments technology. We have had the privilege of working alongside the largest PSPs in the world to develop innovative fit-to-purpose solutions to support the next generation of payments products and services. We‚Äôre excited to roll out our vision for the payments space with our partners and showcase the results of these collaborative efforts with our customers in the upcoming months.‚Äù

With reports anticipating that over 75% of retailers plan to adopt digital asset payment services within the next two years, early movers in the payments space like Checkout.com and FIS have already begun taking advantage of Fireblocks‚Äô Payments Engine to offer merchants the flexibility of 24/7 settlement, increasing cash flow, and reducing operational complexity.

‚ÄúWe‚Äôre enthusiastic about a wide-scale shift among enterprises and consumers towards digital payment systems,‚Äù said Nabil Manji, Head of Crypto & Web3 at FIS. ‚ÄúTogether we will enable crypto-native and traditional businesses to accept, manage and settle digital assets so that they may choose their preferred currency for conducting business. This further builds on our relationship with Fireblocks, where we have already teamed to provide enterprise-grade digital asset investing and wallet technology to our capital market clients.‚Äù 

In addition to stablecoin settlements, PSPs can use Fireblocks‚Äô Payment Engine for: 

Cross-border internal settlement ‚Äî PSPs can now provide global, multinational companies ability to easily settle finances across multiple currencies with greater transparency Creator/seller payouts ‚Äî Enabling PSPs to offer payouts to marketplace participants faster and with more transparency in a way that is more suited to micropayments Pay-ins ‚Äî Allowing PSPs to enable their merchants to accept crypto as a payment method with significantly lower processing fees

‚ÄúAcross the globe, businesses, organizations, local governments, and individual consumers are all emphatically embracing new Web3 and digital payments technologies,‚Äù said Max Rothman, Head of Crypto & Digital Assets at Checkout.com. ‚ÄúTo that end, through Checkout.com‚Äôs partnership with Fireblocks‚Äô Payments Engine, we are able to pioneer new Web 3 solutions for our clients, such as our Stablecoin Settlement solution launched earlier this year. The result is faster, more affordable, and more secure transactions.‚Äù 

Accessible via its UIs and APIs, Fireblocks‚Äô Payments Engine provides a platform for PSPs to manage their merchants‚Äô money flow in an easy and secure manner. Fireblocks is the highest-valued digital asset platform in the world, currently valued at $8 billion, and has also secured the transfers of over $3 trillion in digital assets.

Learn more about how the Fireblocks Payments Engine can power PSPs to build the next generation of digital asset services here: www.fireblocks.com/payments/

ABOUT FIREBLOCKS

Fireblocks is an enterprise-grade platform delivering a secure infrastructure for moving, storing, and issuing digital assets. Fireblocks enables exchanges, custodians, banks, trading desks, and hedge funds to securely scale digital asset operations through patent-pending SGX & MPC technology. They have secured the transfer of over $3 trillion in digital assets and have a unique insurance policy that covers assets in storage & in transit. For more information, please visit www.fireblocks.com.

Image by WorldSpectrum from Pixabay

The post Fireblocks Launches Digital Asset Payments Engine with FIS Joining as New Network Member appeared first on Lions Gate Digital.

04:18 • a day ago

bitnation

FTX Execs Are Allegedly Being Paid Off First: Here Are The Facts

FTX crypto exchange announced that it wasn‚Äôt liquid anymore and a crisis had engulfed the exchange, which meant that the users couldn‚Äôt process withdrawals anymore. This announcement came as a shock to every user of the once-second-biggest crypto exchange in the blockchain space. Interestingly, almost every executive at the Bahamas-based firm, including the CEO and [‚Ä¶]
FTX is processing withdrawals but only for addresses that seem fishy and it looks like these addresses are being used to hide the personalities of people behind them. Twitter users claim that the exchange is paying off its employees and VPs first rather than processing the withdrawals of the users. Sam Bankman-Fried stated that the first and foremost issue for the exchange is to process withdrawals of the users and confirmed that he is talks with several people.

FTX crypto exchange announced that it wasn‚Äôt liquid anymore and a crisis had engulfed the exchange, which meant that the users couldn‚Äôt process withdrawals anymore. This announcement came as a shock to every user of the once-second-biggest crypto exchange in the blockchain space. Interestingly, almost every executive at the Bahamas-based firm, including the CEO and co-founder Sam Bankman-Fried stated that their firm was liquid a few days ago while the situation did not seem like it.

The executives at the exchange asked users not to withdraw funds from the platform as everything was safe and sound despite Binance‚Äôs announcement that it would sell FTX Tokens (FTT) worth billions, hinting at the possibility of a strong crash. This led to people immediately taking money out of their platform, and a record $5 billion was withdrawn from the exchange on Sunday, as noted by Bankman-Fried, also called SBF in the crypto space.

However, according to Jason Choi, the co-founder of Tangent and the founder at Blockcrunch, the executives including the VPs and other insiders are the first to be paid off and they are currently filling their bags. While withdrawals are currently not being processed at FTX, Choi pointed out that it was not the case and several people have been reporting outflows from the exchange.

I know I said I'll take a break off Twitter but new development from @FTX_Official

‚Äî Jason Choi (@mrjasonchoi) November 10, 2022

Choi further pointed out that the withdrawals are being made to addresses that are quite ‚Äúfishy.‚Äù While a number of these addresses look like ‚Äúclean‚Äù addresses, it seems that these blockchain addresses are being used ‚Äúdeliberately to obfuscate any linkage to real individuals,‚Äù according to Choi, who has been in the crypto space for a considerable amount of time.

1/ Multiple people have pointed out that the "withdrawals" ‚Äì which seems to have started again ‚Äì from @FTX_Official are towards addresses that look ‚Ä¶almost fishy?https://t.co/x4IaEECd0a

‚Äî Jason Choi (@mrjasonchoi) November 10, 2022

The author of best selling book, Nik Patel, pointed out that around $200,000 were sent to an address that‚Äôs interacted with other exchanges but not FTX but nothing in over 500 days. This is strange considering the fact that in the last 500 days, the crypto market has been increasingly volatile and almost every crypto coin has either made significant strides, or collapsed completely like LUNC.

‚ÄúI don‚Äôt think I believe in coincidences anymore after what happened. My hunch is that VIPs/insiders are being paid off first as many employees ‚Äì many of whom were publicly asking people to not withdraw ‚Äì had their assets stored on FTX,‚Äù Choi added.

Many other people also pointed out the fact that FTX is paying employees first despite Bankman-Fried apologizing and stating that he plans to ‚Äúdo right by the users.‚Äù

Seems insider.

Maybe employee payouts, or rogue employees offloading friends?

Something isn‚Äôt right.

‚Äî Adam Cochran (adamscochran.eth) (@adamscochran) November 10, 2022

Choi himself has funds stuck on FTX and refuses to believe anything without evidence.

Aptos And Google Cloud Once Again Partner Up: Details

Aptos, a crypto startup that rose to popularity earlier this year after announcing a partnership with Google Cloud in April, has further announced that it will be once again partnering with the cloud computing services provider. This time, the partnership between the two entities is ‚Äúaimed at moving the Web3 movement forward with community and [‚Ä¶]
Layer 1 blockchain Aptos CEO and co-founder Mo Shaikh has announced that it will be once again partnering with the Google Cloud and the deal also features Simon Baksys. Google Cloud will continue to participate on the Aptos mainnet with a staked block-producing node and the layer 1 blockchain will be included as a public dataset for Google Cloud BigQuery. Google is set to introduce a new multi-million dollar developer grant fund with APT and GCP credits and will host hackathons for developers.

Aptos, a crypto startup that rose to popularity earlier this year after announcing a partnership with Google Cloud in April, has further announced that it will be once again partnering with the cloud computing services provider. This time, the partnership between the two entities is ‚Äúaimed at moving the Web3 movement forward with community and strong tech at the heart,‚Äù as per Mo Shaikh, co founder and CEO of the startup.

Layer 1 blockchain startup Aptos recently debuted its blockchain along with the APT token which rose to significant heights in a short period but then crashed immediately as well. Since then, the blockchain has been building its community and aims to attract more project and their creators on the platform which currently lacks any real-world use case. As per Shaikh, ‚Äúbuilding community is the most important thing we [Aptos] can focus on.‚Äù

Aptos and @googlecloud are partnering up again‚Äîand we've got big plans for 2023.

Building community is the most important thing we can focus on. Our partnership is aimed at moving the Web3 movement forward with community and strong tech at the heart. pic.twitter.com/1hF6Z22gCU

‚Äî Mo Shaikh (@moshaikhs) November 10, 2022

In the announcement, Shaikh confirmed that Google Cloud will continue to participate on the Aptos mainnet with a staked block-producing node and the layer 1 blockchain will be included as a public dataset for Google Cloud BigQuery, a fully-managed, serverless data warehouse.

What can the Aptos and web3 community expect?

INFRASTRUCTURE UPDATES:

1Ô∏è‚É£@googlecloud will continue to participate on the Aptos mainnet with a staked block-producing node
2Ô∏è‚É£Aptos will be included as a public dataset for Google Cloud BigQuery pic.twitter.com/DN85ODlfRZ

‚Äî Mo Shaikh (@moshaikhs) November 10, 2022

‚ÄúI think the first time a web2 and a web3 company has come together in such a meaningful way,‚Äù Shaikh said.

Additionally, Aptos also confirmed that for the developers community, Google Cloud will continue to Google-wide hackathons, i.e., hacking events for developers with prizes set for the winners and participants as well. Morever, according to Shaikh, the cloud services provider will also introduce a new multi-million dollar developer grant fund with APT and GCP credits and he added that this is just the beginning.

Additionally, Speaking at a panel at Token2049 in London, Shaikh confirmed that the partnership also features Simon Baksys, the go-to-market and business development lead for Google‚Äôs web3 division.

It was confirmed that the hackathons will be co-hosted by Google and Baksys and Google and the Aptos Foundation will also debut an accelerator program in the coming months.

‚ÄúIt should really be interesting to see those two worlds collide and those projects that will be interested in using both Google tools as well as Aptos tools to produce something really cool,‚Äù Baksys said. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôll definitely be continuing our quote unquote world tour and engaging with the community together.‚Äù

Recently, the layer 1 blockchain came into spotlight after multiple Twitter analysts warned that the APT token will crash on listing. An analyst stated that the absence of strong and transparent tokenomics, coupled with a lack of strong features integrated into the blockchain of Aptos indicates that the developers will rug the buyers of the APT tokens.

A well-known bitcoin automated trading platform called BitiCodes was created to provide both novice and seasoned traders with a smooth trading experience. The program‚Äôs creators claim that in order to conduct winning transactions on your behalf, it makes use of artificial intelligence (AI), complex algorithms, and trading strategies. We think BitiCodes is the best trading programme for both new and seasoned traders based on our own experience using it. With this platform, you don‚Äôt need to worry about learning how to trade or spend a lot of time trading every day. With a 90% success rate, BitiCodes will likely execute winning trades for you nine out of 10 times. The platform can also execute numerous deals per second, a feat that is beyond the capabilities of even the most seasoned cryptocurrency trader. This software also enables you to trade other popular cryptocurrencies including Ethereum, Litecoin, Ripple, Cardano, Bitcoin Cash, and more, in contrast to other automated cryptocurrency trading systems that only handle Bitcoin.

How Does Biticodes Work?

As was previously said, to execute deals, this bitcoin trading platform uses top-notch algorithms, artificial intelligence, and robotics. When you press the trade button, it immediately begins automatically scanning the bitcoin market and analysing charts to find profitable trading chances. AI technology and cutting-edge algorithms are used to accomplish this. When it sees a chance, it immediately sends out its trading bots to carry it out.

This method enables the automated trading program to accurately complete more than ten trades in a single second. So, you can anticipate BitiCodes to complete 1000+ transactions for you in less than an hour. Additionally, the software has a 90% success rate, meaning 900 out of the 1000+ trades will probably be lucrative.

Both desktop and mobile devices are compatible with the official BitiCodes website. Bitcoin Bank Review 2022: Is It A Scam?

Trading robot Bitcoin Bank enables users to execute trades in the cryptocurrency and FX markets automatically. The platform was created by fintech specialists and traders, according to the website, which does not reveal the names of its founders. The platform promises that its software has a 99.4% success record and has won trading accolades, however, [‚Ä¶]

Trading robot Bitcoin Bank enables users to execute trades in the cryptocurrency and FX markets automatically. The platform was created by fintech specialists and traders, according to the website, which does not reveal the names of its founders.

The platform promises that its software has a 99.4% success record and has won trading accolades, however, we have had difficulty verifying these claims. In this review of Bitcoin Bank, we will examine the validity of these assertions and go over the features and services offered by the robot.

Our Verdict

The versatile and flexible bitcoin trading bot known as Bitcoin Bank gives users access to the market. The bot provides access to demo trading and contracts for differences (CFDs) using cryptocurrencies as the base currency. Its authors claim that it is totally free.

We were unable to verify some of the claims made by Bitcoin Bank‚Äôs creators. When communicating with the bot, we advise exercising caution. In addition to reading our evaluation, you can discover more about Bitcoin Bank by using the demo trading feature or by checking out customer reviews.

Bitcoin Bank Overview Robot Name: Bitcoin Bank Robot Type: Crypto Trading Robot Minimum Deposit: $250 Is It a Scam or Legit? Legit Claimed Win Rate: 84% Trading Fees: None Account Fees: None Deposit/Withdrawal Fees: None Software cost: Free Withdrawal Timeframe: 24 hours #‚É£ Number of Cryptocurrencies Supported: 50 Supported Cryptocurrencies: BTC, ETH, LTC, XRP Supported Fiats: USD, EUR, GBP Leverage: 5000:1 Social Trading: Yes Copy Trading: Yes Native Mobile App: No Free Demo Account: Yes Customer Support: Live Chat Verification required: Introductory Phone Call / KYC $250 Minimum Deposit 9.4/10 Excellent Rating Create Account Bitcoin Bank Pros and Cons Pros

According to the website there are no transaction or hidden fees

Offers a demo account for testing and training

No lengthy identity checks

Cons

No Bitcoin Bank app

Is Bitcoin Bank a Scam?

Bitcoin Bank‚Äôs software seems to operate as intended. However, the lavish claims made on its website are simply too good to be true. Your money is always at danger while trading in the bitcoin or forex markets, even though Bitcoin Bank‚Äôs software seems to work as advertised. There are no guarantees in the financial markets, and the website‚Äôs assertion that novice traders may make $1,000 per day in profit is simply too good to be true. The robot also asserts that it has won honors from US trading organisations, but we were unable to locate any evidence to support such claims.

Before investing in the cryptocurrency or FX markets, a trader must perform exhaustive due research. The price of an asset can vary in a matter of seconds due to the extreme volatility of the markets.

What Is Bitcoin Bank?

One of the several cryptocurrency robots that work in the sector, Bitcoin Bank guarantees earnings to account holders who put money into Bitcoin. With the money you deposit into your account, the auto trading platform allegedly executes deals using trading bots that are driven by AI technology. According to reports, this system searches cryptocurrency exchanges and keeps an eye on market movements to identify wise bets.

The purpose of cryptocurrency trading applications like Bitcoin Bank is to purchase Bitcoin for a bargain and subsequently sell it for a profit.

To establish a brand-new market of investing opportunities, Bitcoin Bank advises you to attempt auto-trading while the cryptocurrency is still in its infancy and the market is still extremely volatile.

The idea behind the platform is rather straightforward. On the surface, you can start investing in the market without having any prior knowledge of Bitcoin. While the company implies that a Bitcoin investment can change your life, the reality is far more nuanced, especially when it comes to auto trading. To begin with, this form of trading carries a very high risk, especially if you are unable to confirm the legitimacy of the brokers that Bitcoin Bank has associated with.

How Does Bitcoin Bank Work?

The Bitcoin Bank robot uses machine learning and artificial intelligence to manage trades throughout its platform. The goal of the bot is to find trends in market data and make recommendations on when to enter and exit trades.

It is significant to note that when trading, Bitcoin Bank utilizes contracts for difference (CFDs). You have the choice to purchase particular assets, such as Bitcoin, at a future date and at a defined price with the use of these financial derivative instruments. However, always keep in mind that all trading entails risk.

The difference between the asset‚Äôs current price and its price at the time the contract expires will decide your profit or loss. You trade CFDs when you utilize Bitcoin Bank. One cannot buy the cryptocurrency itself.

When using this bot to day trade cryptocurrencies, Bitcoin Bank works with a network of cryptocurrency brokers. These brokers are in charge of, among other things, position size, trade management, and trade execution.

Do you wish to learn how to invest in cryptocurrencies without putting in a lot of effort? The Bitcoin Bank robot is a thought-provoking instrument. The partner brokers of the robots will carry out the trades on your behalf once you have made the minimal deposit into your Bitcoin Bank account.

The website claims that this trading robot has a 60% success rate. The staff of the Bitcoin Bank claims that this sum. We advise exercising caution because trading cryptocurrency is risky and the market is extremely volatile.

Bitcoin Bank Overview

Minimum Deposit: ‚Ç¨250
Claimed Success Rate: 99%
Supported Cryptocurrencies: BTC
Mobile App?: No
Fees: None

Key Features of Bitcoin Bank Low-cost Trading Bot

Bitcoin Bank does not charge extra fees to customers for trading. This means that even on profitable deals, they don‚Äôt get any commissions. Bitcoin Bank stands out as one of the best Bitcoin robots for traders given that many trading bots take a cut of profitable trades.

The affiliate brokers of the bot may demand a fee for their services, so you should be informed of that. These costs may include trading commissions or account management fees. Make sure you comprehend these costs completely before working with a broker.

Brokers

Bitcoin Bank collaborates with a network of brokers or bitcoin platforms. Your funds will be under the management of these brokers, who will also be in charge of managing and executing trades. We were unable to find any information on registration details or even the identities of the brokers on the robot‚Äôs website.

Demo Account Access

The demo account is accessible to Bitcoin Bank users. Using the demo account, you can test out your strategies and learn more about how the trading bot works. This is quite beneficial because you may test out the service using fictitious money.

Appropriate for beginners

Because it is flexible, Bitcoin Bank helps both new and seasoned traders. Even for beginners, it is simple to develop and operate the trading bot thanks to the platform‚Äôs user-friendly interface.

Customer Service

There are numerous dedicated support organizations for crypto robots. The same applies to Bitcoin Bank. The team behind the robot claims to be able to do this because they have a reliable customer service portal.

How to Use Bitcoin Bank ‚Äì Step-by-Step Guide Step 1: Open an account

You must register on the robot‚Äôs platform in order to use its services using the form above. You can log in to the Bitcoin Bank website once verification is finished. In order to familiarize yourself with the robot‚Äôs interface, you can try out the demo version before being requested to deposit money.

Step 2: Make a Deposit

You must deposit $250 or more in order to start auto trading. You can start auto trading after the money has been deposited by swiping the sidebar to ‚ÄúOn.‚Äù

Step 3: Monitor Trading Bot

If you have autotrading enabled, the robot will look for prospective trades on your behalf and carry them out through the broker‚Äôs interface. A trader may also choose manual trading and define the criteria for initiating or terminating a deal.

Bitcoin Bank vs other Trading Robots

Minimum Deposit: $250 (in-line with other trading bots and platforms)

Success Rate: 99.4% (much higher than other platforms like Immediate Edge with 90%)

Can you make money with Bitcoin Bank?

The goal of Bitcoin Bank‚Äôs automated trades and investments is to increase your chances of success. The bot does not, however, assure earnings, and precautions must be taken to lessen dangers in the cryptocurrency market. If you‚Äôre a newcomer to the industry, do extensive market research and create sound plans that you are confident in and that let you keep your spending under control. This is done so you can simply monitor the bot‚Äôs performance and profit from any profitable tendencies the robot might have missed.

Keep in mind that the Bitcoin Bank profits you receive are based on your contributions. Due to the robot‚Äôs leverage of 1000:1, you can earn up to $1,000 per day more than the money you invested. Therefore, before you start trading or investing, carefully estimate your possible profits and take into account your tax deductions from the IRS or HMRC.

Tips for new traders

Knowledge is everything while investing. Before actually starting to trade, even a seasoned trader will need to do some market research and analysis on the forex and cryptocurrency markets. Avoid trading using leverage while you‚Äôre just getting started because it can result in significant losses and is best avoided until you have more experience. Before choosing to deal with Bitcoin Bank, traders can take into account the following advice.

Discover trading first. The features of the forex and cryptocurrency markets may not resemble those of the stock market to a novice. In order to reduce trading risk, it is always advisable to learn about trading on these markets and be familiar with strategic tools.

Recognize the cryptocurrency and forex markets. The main operations of cryptocurrencies and foreign exchange differ differently from each other and from other marketplaces. You will be obliged to store virtual money in wallets or on the platform if you are not working with a CFD broker. Therefore, find out how to establish security for your crypto assets.

Utilize a demo account to practice. Even if you have experience with forex or cryptocurrency trading, you should practice and open a demo account. This enables you to become familiar with the robot‚Äôs features.

Begin modestly. Always begin modest and expand your portfolio over time. Long-term investment plans are consistently the best ones.

If you can afford to lose money, invest it. Both the forex and cryptocurrency markets are risky and prone to volatility. As a result, the first and most important trading guideline is to only invest money that you can afford to lose.

Has Bitcoin Bank Been Endorsed by Celebrities? Dragons Den ‚Äì Peter Jones, Deborah Meaden

No. A TV reality program called Dragons Den connects aspiring businesspeople with well-known ones throughout the world for finance and partnerships. There have been numerous episodes of the show so far, but none of them are focused on Bitcoin Bank. Although Bitcoin Bank and Dragons Den have not been specifically mentioned as of the time of writing, we have included them nonetheless because this is a program that is frequently mistakenly linked to cryptocurrency trading robots.

Elon Musk

No. Elon Musk is the CEO of Tesla and SpaceX as well as a Bitcoin investor. Because of this, many people think he is connected to Bitcoin Bank. According to our study, there is no evidence that Musk supported or employed this robot to automate his investments.

Jeremy Clarkson

Despite claims and assertions, our research could not find a single shred of evidence backing up the fact that Jeremy Clarkson may have endorsed the Bitcoin Bank website.

Holly Marie Willoughby

Despite claims and assertions, our research could not find a single shred of evidence backing up the fact that Holly Marie Willoughby may have endorsed the Bitcoin Bank account.

Idris Elba

Despite claims and assertions, our research could not find a single shred of evidence backing up the fact that Idris Elba may have endorsed the Bitcoin Bank website.

Ant McPartlin

Despite claims and assertions, our research could not find a single shred of evidence backing up the fact that Ant McPartlin may have endorsed the Bitcoin Bank app.

Nicole Kidman

Despite claims and assertions, our research could not find a single shred of evidence backing up the fact that Nicole Kidman may have endorsed the Bitcoin Bank app.

Trevor Noah

Despite claims and assertions, our research could not find a single shred of evidence backing up the fact that Trevor Noah may have endorsed the Bitcoin Bank crypto trading platform.

Gordon Ramsey

No. Gordon Ramsay is a well-known British television presenter and celebrity chef. He has a fascination with cryptocurrencies, and there have been reports linking him to Bitcoin Bank. According to what we have discovered, he has neither sponsored Bitcoin Bank nor is he affiliated to the robot.

Is It Possible to Withdraw Earnings?

Your assets and earnings cannot be stored in a bitcoin wallet provided by Bitcoin Bank. Your funds can only be accessed through the brokers because it is linked to them and stores them there. The steps for taking your money out after it has been earned through automated trades and investments at Bitcoin Bank are listed below.

Log into your trading or investment account on the platform of a broker that is connected to Bitcoin Bank.

Go to your wallet and select withdraw to begin the withdrawal procedure.

Choose your preferred payment option‚ÄîPayPal or a bank‚Äîand enter it.

Enter the desired withdrawal amount.

The withdrawal procedure, which could take up to 24 hours to complete, can be started by clicking proceed.

Remember that the majority of cryptocurrency brokers do not accept settlements in crypto assets, hence Bitcoin Bank accepts a number of fiat currencies to make the withdrawal process as simple as possible. Choose your favorite fiat currency as a result to make a successful withdrawal.

What are the fees for Bitcoin Bank?

Charges play a significant role in cryptocurrency trading. Here is a summary of the cryptocurrency robot‚Äôs fees structure from the website for our Bitcoin Bank review:

According to the Bitcoin Bank website, there are no costs associated with using the service. Profits earned are entirely yours. What is actually yours, though, is what‚Äôs left after your brokers‚Äô fees are subtracted. Beyond the initial $250 deposit, you are under no obligation to hold onto or give Bitcoin Bank any additional funds.

Transaction Fees: None
Trading Commissions: None
Account Maintenance Fees: None
Hidden charges: None

FAQs Is the Bitcoin Bank regulated?

It‚Äôs difficult to express this. On the Bitcoin Bank website, we couldn‚Äôt find much information about brokers and exchanges that are subject to regulation. However, as we have already indicated, we advise you to stay away from any brokers who offer absurdly high leverage on your deposit because they are almost certainly unregulated. CySec, FCA, ASIC, and FSB are the top regulators of cryptocurrency traders; seek any of these organizations before doing business with any dealer.

Is Bitcoin Bank safe?

Your personal information is technically safe at Bitcoin Bank because SSL encryption is used to protect it. We cannot, however, ensure that your money will be secure and that you will benefit due to the problems with the difficult withdrawal process and the high level of risk associated with leveraged transactions.

How user-friendly is Bitcoin Bank?

The navigation of the app itself, Bitcoin Bank, is simple. The user interface is elegant and rather simple. Fast account creation is likely a result of the company‚Äôs desire for you to deposit money and start trading. Use a demo account to practice trading without using real money if the Bitcoin Bank site is confusing you.

Tesler Trading Review 2022: Is It A Scam?

The Tesler trading system, sometimes known as 7Tesler, is promoted as an automated trading platform that seeks out winning trading setups and executes them on traders‚Äô behalf. The trading platform, which is also known as the Tesler trading app, states that it can trade a number of well-known cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, and Litecoin. [‚Ä¶]

The Tesler trading system, sometimes known as 7Tesler, is promoted as an automated trading platform that seeks out winning trading setups and executes them on traders‚Äô behalf.

The trading platform, which is also known as the Tesler trading app, states that it can trade a number of well-known cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, and Litecoin. Although 7Tesler doesn‚Äôt give much information regarding its historical performance, the trading platform‚Äôs website features good comments and endorsements from both present and former users.

However, phony reviews do exist. So, is the Tesler trading app real? We‚Äôll examine this trading platform in depth in our 7Tesler review to assist traders in determining whether it‚Äôs appropriate for them.

Our Verdict

According to its description, 7Tesler is a cryptocurrency trading platform that can execute deals on users‚Äô behalf and send out crypto signals. The site includes positive testimonials from previous and present users, but traders may wish to be skeptical of them since they were provided by the platform.

If you do decide to try 7Tesler trading out, be sure to test out a withdrawal as soon as possible because there are several warning signs that could indicate if the company is a scam or authentic circulating on Google and social media platforms.

Use the demo account first before making a larger real money deposit, as is the case with most crypto trade bot programs. This enables traders to test the platform and judge it for themselves.

Is 7Tesler a Scam?

Our 7Tesler review‚Äôs major objective is to provide a response to the question, ‚ÄúIs 7Tesler a scam or legitimate? We discovered that the 7Tesler trading platform utilizes an algorithm to trade Bitcoin and a number of well-known altcoins on behalf of traders. Additionally, we discovered that the site provides a demo trading account, allowing consumers to try out 7Tesler for free.

We also discovered that positive reviews for 7Tesler that are posted on the trading platform‚Äôs website are very positive. These positive reviews, which originate from previous and present customers, were chosen by 7Tesler.

The validity of these reviews cannot be determined, and it is unknown whether traders have profited from using 7Tesler. The risk involved in trading should never be underestimated, and past performance is no guarantee of future success.

What Is 7Tesler?

A trading program called 7Tesler finds possible trading opportunities in the prices of well-known cryptocurrencies. This is a platform for algorithmic or automated crypto trading.

The 7Tesler algorithm is able to recognise situations that could result in cryptocurrency trading profits. The platform can also execute trades on behalf of traders by funding trades with funds from their accounts. However, there is no assurance that traders will make money, and they should be aware that all trading involves risk.

Both experienced traders and those who are new to the cryptocurrency market can use 7Tesler‚Äôs platform, the company claims. The cryptocurrency trading platform is easy to use and quick to get started with.

The 7Tesler cryptocurrency software can currently trade four of the most well-known cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, and Litecoin. The platform is free to use, and there are no commissions taken from traders‚Äô earnings. The sole financial need to begin utilising 7Tesler is to open a new account and deposit a minimum of $250.

How Does 7Tesler Work?

As the prices of cryptocurrencies rise and fall, the 7Tesler trading platform uses a complex algorithm to produce trade recommendations. Regarding this proprietary methodology, the platform does not give much information.

However, it might have been built to spot price patterns that have previously preceded successful price movements after being trained on several years‚Äô worth of crypto market data. Since the 2017 cryptocurrency bull run, bitcoin robots have gained popularity.

When certain price patterns are identified, 7Tesler sends traders notifications. Additionally, the platform opens trades on its own, using funds from traders‚Äô accounts to take positions in line with the coin signal. The 7Tesler algorithm monitors a trade‚Äôs development and closes the position when a stop loss or take profit level is reached.

All transaction proceeds, including any winnings, are then transferred back to traders‚Äô accounts. The funds can then be withdrawn or utilised for another trade.

While 7Tesler is capable of identifying setups and trading on behalf of customers to generate profits, traders should keep in mind that there is no assurance that its signals are reliable. Trading is risky by nature.

Tesler Overview

Supported markets: BTC, ETH, XRP, LTC
Withdrawal time: 24 hours
Minimum deposit: $250

Key Features of Tesler Platform No Prior Crypto Market Knowledge Required

Both novice traders and seasoned traders can utilise this trading platform, claims 7Tesler. To begin using 7Tesler, no prior knowledge of bitcoin trading is necessary. While less experienced traders might be able to start trading right away, it might take them a bit longer to become used to the 7Tesler dashboard.

4 Well-known Cryptocurrencies Available to Trade

By market cap, Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, and Litecoin are the four cryptocurrencies that 7Tesler may trade. Due to the extreme volatility of these cryptocurrencies and the fact that they don‚Äôt always move in unison, there may be additional trading chances on the platform.

Demo Account Trading

All traders at 7Tesler have access to a demo trading account. Users can evaluate 7Tesler‚Äôs performance in light of the current market environment by demo trading, sometimes referred to as paper trading. Additionally, it allows users a chance to assess the platform as a whole and determine whether 7Tesler is appropriate for their trading objectives and style.

To access the demo trading account, traders must create a 7Tesler account.

Free and Quick Withdrawals

Traders can quite easily remove money from their accounts using 7Tesler. The platform does not impose withdrawal fees and responds to withdrawal requests in less than 24 hours. As a result, traders can withdraw funds from their accounts whenever they want to profit from 7Tesler trading.

Works On Any Device

Any device, including Windows and Mac laptops and iOS and Android mobile phones, can use the trading platform, claims 7Tesler. For traders who don‚Äôt want to download and install software, the trading platform is also accessible online. This makes using 7Tesler from any location simple.

How to Use Tesler Platform ‚Äì Step-by-Step Guide Step 1: Open an account

Look for the signup box towards the top of this page to join the 7Tesler trading platform. Name, email address, and phone number are required details for new users. Click ‚ÄúRegister Now‚Äù when you‚Äôre ready to open a trading account.

Step 2: Make a Deposit

All new customers of 7Tesler trading platform are required to deposit a minimum of $250. Payments can be made on the site via credit cards, debit cards, bank transfers, and e-wallets.

Step 3: Monitor Trading Platform

With 7Tesler, traders can start live trading straight away, but many will want to begin with demo trading. Before risking real money, customers can get acquainted with the 7Tesler platform and assess how the trading service works in the context of the current market.

Traders can switch to live trading if they are pleased with using 7Tesler trading account in demo mode. To turn on this feature, flip a switch in the 7Tesler dashboard. Following the activation of live trading, 7Tesler will immediately start opening actual positions in Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, and Litecoin using funds in the trader‚Äôs account.

Can you make money with Tesler?

Because 7Tesler is a user-friendly bot, you can use it even if you are not an expert in bitcoin trading signals. According to reports, the bot employs algorithms to assist you find the finest bargains that can be profitable by quickly digesting vast amounts of information. Additionally, it runs on its own, so you don‚Äôt have to stay at your trade station all day.

In addition, 7Tesler asserts that it employs cutting-edge technology to spot patterns that can be advantageous to consumers and that it only acts when it thinks the timing is appropriate by using money that has already been placed. Additionally, 7Tesler does away with emotional trading, which can lead to irrational conclusions.

Tips for new traders

While working with 7Tesler, we encourage you to start trading with a little sum of no more than ‚Ç¨250. You should be able to make money with these limited resources. To reap even bigger benefits, you can also decide to reinvest your gains.

To fully benefit from the potential of the 7Tesler system, we always advise investors to reinvest their winnings. It is usually a prudent choice to reinvest a small amount of your income after taking some of it out. If they want to avoid losing their money quickly, anyone who is serious about trading cryptocurrency profitably needs to follow this strategy.

Through tutorials, webinars, and Q&A sessions, these brokers and experienced traders have made their knowledge accessible to novice investors who wish to increase their trading knowledge and experience.

Due to their expertise, your trading experience will be trouble-free.

A transparent company that cares about its clients‚Äô success, 7Tesler was formed expressly to help its investors better understand the market and bitcoin in general.

Utilizing all of the excellent information that the 7Tesler system provides will help you improve your decision-making abilities and improve your trading experience. We always advise users of the trading platform to only invest money they can afford to lose because the cryptocurrency market is unstable.

The majority of your trades will result in significant profits if you use the 7Tesler trading signals system to trade. However, the system is powerless to halt significant losses brought on by carelessness and the use of dangerous trades, techniques, and practices.

If you carefully follow these recommendations, you can routinely make money with the 7Tesler system, regardless of whether you‚Äôre experienced traders or not.

Profit Secret Review 2022: Is It A Scam?

The type of rewards that Profit Secret is now offering is only available on a select few bitcoin trading platforms. Only 1% of the world‚Äôs wealth, or more than 98 percent of it, is currently held by just a small minority of people, according to Profit Secret. The creators of the Profit Secret trading system [‚Ä¶]

The type of rewards that Profit Secret is now offering is only available on a select few bitcoin trading platforms. Only 1% of the world‚Äôs wealth, or more than 98 percent of it, is currently held by just a small minority of people, according to Profit Secret.

The creators of the Profit Secret trading system believe the program can achieve an accuracy rate of above 85%.

We strongly suggest that you read our in-depth Profit Secret trading system review before deciding whether or not to sign up for this fantastic trading method that is earning people millions of dollars. It is without a doubt the best way to determine whether the system is functional.

Our Verdict

After investigating this website, we are confident that the Profit Secret is a genuine business and not a fraud. You should definitely open a free account if you‚Äôre going to begin trading cryptocurrencies.

You can get assistance from Profit Secret‚Äôs free account managers and 24/7 support staff at any time.

Additionally, their withdrawal process was simple and hassle-free. Profit Secret won‚Äôt be a bad choice if you‚Äôve always desired to earn some extra cash.

Is Profit Secret a Scam?

Users may invest in Bitcoin with Profit Secret easily and safely without having to disclose any of their personal financial details.

You must register for an account on the website in order to use this app, and access to your account must first be verified in some way. There are five options available once you‚Äôve logged into your account: Deposit Funds, Trade Now, Make Picks (which also needs registration), Watchlist, and Settings. The fifth option allows you to configure settings such as what time zone it is placed in or how much data storage space should be allowed per day for viewing charts and other items related to business needs. The first four options all demand KYC compliance from each user individually.

Users of the trading site The Profit Secret have access to more than 15 different cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin and Ethereum, for trading.

It also has access to a wide range of other tools, such as charts showing past prices for the various instruments offered on the platform. This makes it perfect for both seasoned traders and those who are new to trading cryptocurrencies.

The demo account, which enables you to practice trading before doing so on your live account or real money accounts, is one feature that distinguishes this service from others. By converting your initial payment into virtual coins and starting off modestly in order to not lose too much if something goes wrong during an investing transaction, you will be able to observe how profitable trading might possibly make you.

What Is Profit Secret?

Modern technology is used by the trading platform Profit Secret to assist you in trading. The system is appropriate for both beginning and advanced traders due to its cutting-edge technology, intricate trading system, and user-friendly interface. This is a difficult task to finish because the requirements and expectations of both types of traders on a platform are so different.

For instance, a professional trader would be searching for features and speed that will enable them to save time and execute trades more effectively. A fresh trader will have a totally different perspective. They are constantly seeking the easiest way to make money. Additionally, they seek a platform that is simple to use and time-saving. Due to their inexperience, novice traders prefer to be led.

How Does Profit Secret Work?

The next standard for trade is cryptocurrency, but how do you get started? A bitcoin programme called Profit Secret aids novice traders. With just a ‚Ç¨250 deposit, you may start using their initial portfolio generator to make some simple trades against the price of bitcoin. Simply remove what‚Äôs left of your money from the account whenever your balance on Profit Secret rises enough or if it‚Äôs not working out yet (or ever)!

Profit Secret is a cryptocurrency trading platform that only assesses fees when you request a withdrawal of your funds into your bank account. Thus, traders who desire more earnings won‚Äôt be dissatisfied when the fee is subtracted from them.

With an intuitive user interface, this application makes it simple for traders of all experience levels, from novices to experts, to use cryptocurrencies.

Key Features of Profit Secret Trading System

There are a lot of really great features in Profit Secret. They were a lot more useful than other trading tools, in our opinion. These tools will probably improve your trading experience, in our opinion. The top trading features of Profit Secret are all described here.

Quick registration

Profit Secret accounts can be opened in less than 20 minutes. You only need to fill out a form with the very minimum of information. After you submit the form, you will be given a licenced broker.

Cheap Commissions

Under 0.1% is the extremely low commission rate charged by Profit Secret account. By charging this fee, brokers are given a perk. It has one of the lowest market commission rates.

Leverage

Leverage trading with Profit Secret is a type of trading that enables investors to complete spot transactions (purchases and sells) using brokers‚Äô lent funds. Leverage transactions using Profit Secret up to 5000:1. Ask your broker about the dangers of trading with leverage, and then perhaps look into how to get started.

Exclusive Free Account Access

Profit Secret Account admittance requirements are pretty acceptable. There are no account registration fees associated with this technology. As previously said, you will only be asked to make a little deposit, which will function as your starting trading capital and is not an unreasonable sum.

Demo Trading Account

You are under no obligations for trading with Profit Secret while in demo mode. If you want to start trading in real-time right away, you can do so. This is a great way to get acquainted with the software. Make sure to discuss the risk-reward criteria for your trading with your account broker.

The Profit Secret Always Moves Forward

Using the trading method of Profit Secret platform, you can quickly generate a sizable profit. It is effective and can find successful trades without any time-consuming or analytical work on your part.

Responsive Customer Care

A customer support team is available through the Profit Secret platform to assist both novice and seasoned traders. You have 24 hour access to this service every day of the week. They‚Äôre reachable by phone, live chat, or email.

You Can Trade Various Cryptocurrencies

You are able to trade many cryptocurrencies using Profit Secret. Although many people think of Bitcoin as the most widely used cryptocurrency, there are actually a lot more, and Profit Secret gives you access to all crypto trading pairings.

Accessible Anywhere

Profit Secret lets you trade from anywhere. A live, unbroken internet connection is all you need.

How to Use Profit Secret ‚Äì Step-by-Step Guide Step 1: Open an account

To avoid joining up from a fake page or becoming a victim of fraud, make sure you sign up using the form above.

Step 2: Verify your Account

Fill out a KYC form with a broker advisor from your matched brokers. Then you have to open a Profit Secret account and make the minimum deposit in order to start trading.

Step 3: Make a Deposit

In actuality, to get started with Profit Secret, you only need to deposit 250 EUR. Given that it uses this capital for your very first trade, the technology is quite transparent and merely calls for the bare minimum.

Step 4: Monitor Trading Bot

Before starting a real transaction, Profit Secret gives you the option to get comfortable with the account. Since experienced traders would likely choose to jump right into live trading, we believe that this demo-trade functionality will only appeal to inexperienced traders.

Easy KYC procedure (compared to other platforms with massive amounts of information required).

Can you make money with Profit Secret?

Users may invest in Bitcoin with Profit Secret‚Äôs auto trading platform easily and safely without having to disclose any of their personal financial details.

You must register for an account on the website in order to use this app, and access to your account must first be verified in some way. There are five options available once you‚Äôve logged into your account: Deposit Funds, Trade Now, Make Picks (which also needs registration), Watchlist, and Settings. The fifth option allows you to configure settings such as what time zone it is placed in or how much data storage space should be allowed per day for viewing charts and other items related to business needs. The first four options all demand KYC compliance from each user individually.

Users of the free personal account manager have access to more than 15 different cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin and Ethereum, for trading.

It also has access to a wide range of other tools, such as charts showing past prices for the various instruments offered on the platform. This makes it perfect for both seasoned traders and those who are new to trading cryptocurrencies.

The demo account, which enables you to practise trading before doing so on your live account or real money accounts, is one feature that distinguishes this service from others. By changing your original payment into virtual coins and starting out little to avoid suffering a significant loss, you will be able to discover how profitable transactions could potentially be for you.

Tips for new traders

When it comes to learning how to make the most of trading platforms like Profit Secret, the amount of knowledge available online is overwhelming. But not all of this data is significant. We determined that it would be helpful to give you simply the most useful tips for trading with Profit Secret:

Cooperate with your seasoned brokers

Nothing is worse than utilising a trading system for the first time without enough support. Profit Secret has prioritised working with regulated and CySEC-licensed brokers as a result. These brokers are available to help you manage your account properly and to offer you assistance. Their primary objective is to make sure that your trading trip is successful. They are knowledgeable and professional.

Deposit The Minimum

Compared to other trading systems, Profit Secret is not as demanding. You‚Äôll see throughout the evaluation that the deposit needed is actually relatively small in comparison to other technologies. However, until you have made your first investment, we advise you to only make the minimal amount. After that, you can start investing again. Trading responsibly is the main focus of Profit Secret.

Take Regular Profit Withdrawals

It‚Äôs incredibly exhilarating to make your first profit, and you might want to reinvest right away. There is not a single issue with doing this. However, we advise that you do a profit withdrawal as quickly as possible. You‚Äôll be able to discern between your gains and your trading capital in this manner.

Spend time each day on your account.

Regularly checking on your account is a smart idea. Some of you might work full-time. You can accomplish both with Profit Secret, so don‚Äôt worry. All we ask is that you log into your account each day for at least 20 to 30 minutes. You can stay current with your account in this way.

Trade Sensitively

Due to the abundance of options that are presented to you, trading on the cryptocurrency market can be really thrilling. However, we advise you to only invest if you can afford to do so without a doubt. For instance, just use your available cash or your saved money as ready-to-invest capital.

Monitor Your Transactions

Profit Secret will soon enable you to start earning money. After that, you will have to pay tax on your capital gain. This calls for a transaction log, which Profit Secret makes available for free download. You can use this as a useful tool to determine your overall profit or loss since you began trading.

He might see the worth in investing in such cutting-edge technologies early on before others who wait to invest do so and suffer significant losses.

Nicole Kidman

Nicole Kidman, an Oscar-winning actress who is worth ‚Ç¨183 million and is well-known for her parts in movies like Moulin Rouge!, has lately been the subject of rumours regarding a potential investment into Profit Secret. Our staff was unable to locate any evidence that she is actively working on this project, but we haven‚Äôt completely ruled anything out just yet.

It has been suggested that The Daily Show‚Äôs Trevor Noah is connected to Profit Secret. Many claim that he became wealthy as a result of his involvement with cryptocurrencies, but in reality it was due of his comic background and job on The Daily Show, for which he was paid significantly more than the average comedian.
